name: Elderly's Voice
text:
This is a 'festival'.
It's a special market that's only
open on festival days.

I realized too late that I should have used something like 'fair' instead
for the sake of consistency, I'll keep the previous ones be,
but keep in mind that there will be differences

name: Boy's Voice
text:
...I see.
Is that food a sample?
It doesn't look like it's locked or anything.

name: Elderly's Voice
text:
Ahaha!
In your hometown, it might be normal to think so.
Everything's real over here, and that's the norm.

name: Elderly's Voice
text:
Is there a stall you're interested in, Barrel?
Tell me whatever you want, Grandma
will buy it for you, okay?

name: Elderly's Voice
text:
Oops, you can't have the whole stall now?
If I brought something like that home, Grandma's house
would turn into a party venue every day!

name: Barrel
text:
...There's nothing in particular.
You can buy what you like, Grandma.
I'm fine with just having a little.

name: Barrel's Grandmother
text:
What's wrong, Barrel?
Do you not like festivals?
You don't have to force yourself if you're not having fun, alright?

name: Barrel
text:
N-No, that's not it. It's not boring!
...In a place with this many people,
I have to be 'quiet'.

name: Barrel's Grandmother
text:
...I see.
Is that what your
parents told you to do?

name: Barrel
text:
...Yeah.
A kid like me shouldn't stand out outside,
or scary people will notice me.

name: Barrel
text:
...Um, I don't really know
what kind of people
those scary people are, though.

name: Barrel's Grandmother
text:
...I see.
Well, given the nature of those two,
I guess it can't be helped that they taught you that.

name: Barrel's Grandmother
text:
You're properly following your parents' instructions.
Grandma is proud of you.
You're a good boy, Barrel.

name: Barrel's Grandmother
text:
...But, well.
Since today's a special occasion,
why don't you try being a little bad boy?

name: Barrel's Grandmother
text:
A reward from Grandma to the good boy, Barrel.
You can enjoy this festival
as much as you want.

name: Barrel
text:
Ehh!?
I-is it really okay to do that...
But, if I'm not a good boy...

name: Barrel's Grandmother
text:
Haha, it's alright.
You can go back to being a good boy
as soon as the festival is over.

name: Barrel's Grandmother
text:
Because it's not your fault
that you're being a bad boy.
It's because Grandma is—

name: Barrel's Grandmother
text:
a bad~ adult who's turning
you into a bad boy.
Oops, keep it a secret from your parents, okay?

name: Barrel's Grandmother
text:
Now, let's go, Barrel.
If we don't hurry, the festival will end
before you can become a bad boy.

name: Barrel
text:
...O-okay.
But, I wonder if it's really okay...

That day, I still remember
it vividly.

The bright lights floating in the darkness,
the voices of happy people, and—

The precious warmth transmitted
from that slightly bony hand.

name: Barrel
text:
Good morning~!
Another great day for a festival...
Wait, that sky was a projection~.

name: Turbak
text:
Ahaha, it can't be helped, Barrel-kun.
With this town's high-quality reproduction,
you tend to forget it's on the moon!

name: Turbak
text:
[Player]-kun, good morning too!
Did you sleep well yesterday?
If there was anything inconvenient, don't hesitate to tell me!

options.text: Good morning, you two!
I slept like a log!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I see, I'm glad you were satisfied!
It's a standard hotel, but it's a recommended one on the moon tours our company offers!

options.text: I'm still... sleepy...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
A-Are you okay?
If the pillow didn't suit you or something, I'll let the hotel know.

text:
The next morning, the three of them gathered at the
Japan Pavilion and exchanged smiles and greetings.
A weary voice calls out to them.

name: Roudin
text:
Ah... Good morning.
Fwaaah, I'm sleepy...

options.text: Good morning, Roudin-san!
You look sleepy...?
Should I have slept with you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hahaha!
That's a charming proposition.
Maybe I'll take you up on that next time I can't sleep.

name: Barrel
text:
What's wrong, what's wrong, Roudin-san!
You look really sleepy~!
Were you too excited about the festival to sleep~?

name: Roudin
text:
Ah... That might be part of it,
but my work has been mostly at night lately.
I've gotten bad at mornings.

name: Barrel
text:
Ooh, I know what you mean~!
When I first became a police officer, it was tough
getting used to the rotating shifts~!

name: Roudin
text:
Well, just as you said, I'll have to get used to it.
For now, I'll just pour some
thick, bitter coffee down my throat...

As he says that, Roudin scratches his head
and stifles a yawn, then
suddenly turns to Turbak with a smile.

name: Roudin
text:
So, that's how it is, Turbak!
Can I ask you for a cup that
will knock my socks off?

name: Turbak
text:
M-Me!?
L-Leave it to me!
Um, I'll arrange for the beans...

name: Roudin
text:
Ahaha, I'm just kidding.
My bad, my bad, just ignore me.
And besides—

name: Roudin
text:
Turbak, I think you should relax
a little more and enjoy yourself?
If you want the customers to have fun, you have to have fun first.

name: Turbak
text:
Do I seem that tense?
Hmm, I'm always like this,
so I'm not really aware of it...

options.text: Then let's make a conscious effort to have fun!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If you all say so, I must have been tense.
I guess I'll start by being aware of it.
Yeah, I'll do my best!

options.text: Isn't it fine to be your usual self?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Thank you, [Player]-kun.
But, since you went to the trouble of pointing it out, I'll try to be careful in my own way!

options.text: Should I give you a massage or something?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're even good at massages, amazing!
Thank you, I'll definitely take you up on that after today's work is over!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text: And, if I relax, I'll be able to work even harder tomorrow!

text:
Turbak fires himself up again with a smile.
To it, Roudin smiles at his figure
and calls out to him.

name: Roudin
text:
Ah... It seems you're even more fired up now.
Well, if that's how you work best,
I guess I can't say anything about it.

name: Turbak
text:
I was really happy that you were worried about me!
Thank you, Roudin-san. Once I'm aware of it,
I'll put your words into practice!

name: Turbak
text:
...Oops, it's about time to check
the schedule for today.
First, I want you to look at this data.

As he says that, Turbak operates the device
in his hand and shows the visitor data
to the group.

name: Turbak
text:
Yesterday's collaboration stream,
and the exhibition match.
The results of those are clearly showing!

name: Roudin
text:
Oh, that's nice.
It's not a full house right away,
but it looks like we can keep going with this plan.

name: Barrel
text:
Alright, I'm going to go all out~!
Fufun, maybe we should aim for
the number one spot in visitors~!

name: Turbak
text:
That might be a good idea!
It's a really happy thing when
everyone's hard work pays off!

name: Roudin
text:
Oh, you're full of fighting spirit.
Well, just don't get too fired up
and burn out in the second half.

options.text: I'll do my best too!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm counting on you if you say so!
Your operation yesterday was reliable, so I'll be counting on you today too.

options.text: I'll do my best, in moderation.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, that's nice.
This event is a long haul, so I think it's fine to take it at a moderate pace.

options.text: By the way, what's the stream schedule for today?

name: Roudin
text:
...Well, about today's stream.
I'm coordinating with our collaboration partners.
How's it going, Turbak?

name: Turbak
text:
When I looked a little while ago, it was still...
Ah, I just got a reply. It looks like we can go
on the collaboration stream without any problems!

name: Turbak
text:
The stream time is in the afternoon, same as yesterday,
before and after the exhibition match,
so please be on standby here until then.

name: Barrel
text:
Roger~!
Man, you're coordinating
until the last minute~

Barrel is surprised at the timing of the schedule decision.
Roudin gives a wry smile at
his words and proceeds to explain.

name: Roudin
text:
Well, this collaboration stream project itself
was squeezed in at the last minute.
We're asking for coordination on a wing and a prayer.

name: Turbak
text:
Especially for our Japan Pavilion,
the offer to the heroes was just
decided recently, right?

name: Turbak
text:
It was a pretty unreasonable request,
but they kindly accepted it.
I'm nothing but grateful to the heroes!

name: Barrel
text:
I see, so that's why~!
Man, this festival is full of surprises,
I can't stop being excited~!

name: Turbak
text:
I'm glad you feel that way.
Oh, speaking of which, Barrel-kun.
I implemented your proposal from yesterday!

name: Barrel
text:
My proposal from yesterday... Ah!!
Seriously, Turbak-san~!!
Yeeeeehaaaaw!!

options.text: A proposal from Barrel?
He looks so happy...
Does it have something to do with the festival?

name: Barrel
text:
Hehehe...
It's my own awesome idea to
liven up the festival~!

name: Turbak
text:
Yeah, it's a super happy idea.
Take a look at this!

As they say that, Turbak and Barrel
head to a stall, and soon
return to the group with a tray in hand.

name: Barrel
text:
Ta-da!!
The Japan Pavilion's special item,
the Exciting Festival Stall Set~!

name: Barrel
text:
It's a sampler set packed with a little bit
of all the festival stall classics~!
We'll use this for promotion~!

name: Turbak
text:
Just now, I tried handing it out
as a sample, and it was pretty
popular with the guests!

name: Turbak
text:
It seems to be spreading a little
on the Internet too, so we'll use
it in conjunction with the stream!

options.text: Ooh, that's a good deal.
Let's hand them out like crazy!
It smells so good, I'm getting hungry...

name: Roudin
text:
Heh... Not bad.
For those who don't know Japan,
it's hard to know which stall to go to, and—

name: Roudin
text:
It's nice to be able to try
unfamiliar dishes like this!
Oh, I'll have one of these takoyaki.

As he says, from the tray Barrel is holding,
Roudin pops a steaming takoyaki into his mouth.

name: Barrel
text:
W-Wait!?
Roudin-san!
That's my own special version...

name: Roudin
text:
*munch*...
It's piping hot, but as expected,
it's delicious— Wait.

name: Roudin
text:
Gaaaaaaaaahh!?
Guh, s-so spicy...
Water, water!!

name: Turbak
text:
R-Roudin-san!?
Um, water, right!
Here!!

options.text: That's extra spicy sauce!?
Turbak-san, calm down!
Water, water!!

text:
Roudin writhes in agony from the super
spicy takoyaki customized for Barrel.
After a while, he finally regains his composure—

name: Roudin
text:
Hah... My tongue is still tingling.
G-God, that was rough...

name: Barrel
text:
I'm sorry~, Roudin-san.
I should have stopped you properly...

name: Roudin
text:
Hey, hey, don't apologize!
I just snuck a bite and blew myself up.
Besides, it's kind of addicting!

name: Roudin
text:
I like spicy food too,
so I'd like to try again with
a slightly milder one.

name: Barrel
text:
Seriously~!? Ooh~!
In that case, leave it to me~!
I want to see your limit, Roudin-san~!

options.text: Ooh, Barrel found a spicy food buddy...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehe, I'm so happy~!
Inspector and Furlong would never join me for spicy food~!

options.text: I didn't know you liked spicy food, Roudin-san.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text: I don't think I used to be, but the food in Tesfinito is usually full of spices, so I got used to it.

options.text: Let me try some too...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-I think you'd better not!
Actually, I tried a little taste too, but it was...
Well, a unique taste!

text:
As they talk, the heat in Roudin's mouth
finally subsides, and he smiles
and turns back to Barrel.

name: Roudin
text:
By the way, Barrel, it's a bit late to ask, but...
How do you know so much
about Japanese festivals?

name: Roudin
text:
You're from America, just like me, right?
Have you been living in Japan for a long time?

At Roudin's casual question,
Barrel replies with a smile.

name: Barrel
text:
Ah... I've only been living in Japan full-time
since I joined the police academy,
so it hasn't been that long, but—

name: Barrel
text:
My grandma lives in Japan~.
So, I've been coming to Japan pretty
often since I was a kid~.

name: Barrel
text:
My parents' home was in
quite the rough neighborhood,
so I couldn't really play outside at home—

name: Barrel
text:
So, when I was a kid, the first time
my grandma took me out to play
in Japan was at a Japanese festival~!

name: Turbak
text:
Ah, the first festival you go to really
becomes a special memory, doesn't it!?
I totally get that!

name: Barrel
text:
Exactly~!
I've been to many American festivals
since I got a little older, but...

name: Barrel
text:
Maybe it's that first impression~,
but for me, Japanese festivals
are just special~!

options.text: So that's why you volunteered for this event.
You were really into the suit design too.
Barrel, you as a kid... Tell me more!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-san, are you interested in my childhood~?
Hehehe, I get it~!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Even as a kid, I was already showing glimpses of the cool hero I'd become~.
I'll send you a video later~!

name: Roudin
text:
I see.
No wonder you were so enthusiastic
about the design meeting with Sui.

name: Barrel
text:
Thanks to Sui-san,
who gave form to my passion,
it became the coolest suit ever~!

name: Barrel
text:
That suit is based on the jinbei
that my grandma made for me
during the festival~!

name: Turbak
text:
A cherished outfit, I see.
Something like that seems really nice!
—Oops, it's time.

name: Turbak
text:
Everyone, it's about time to move.
This time, the stream at the other
pavilion is first, so I'll guide you!

The group starts walking, led by Turbak,
and as they walk, various pavilions
show their respective forms.

And Turbak stops walking,
looks back at the group, and smiles.
In front of [Player]—

A complete change from yesterday's night sky area,
a blue sky spreads out above them,
and a sweet fragrance tickles their noses.

There, too, the festival landscape they
remembered from a previous request was
reproduced exactly as it was.

options.text: Ooh, what nice weather...
Today is Wehmalt!
I've seen this place somewhere before too...

name: Turbak
text:
Everyone, good work!
This is today's collaboration stream partner,
Wehmalt Pavilion!

name: Roudin
text:
Oh, you look like you're having fun, Turbak.
I take it you've done your homework on
this pavilion too?

name: Turbak
text:
Of course!
I've got it all in my head!

In response to Roudin's words,
Turbak nods with a huge smile
and begins his explanation.

name: Turbak
text:
A planet in the same Sunflower Galaxy
as yesterday, the city of Wehmalt.
It's a tourist destination famous for its flower festival.

name: Turbak
text:
This city has a warm climate all year round,
and it's a place with very rich vegetation.
The symbol of that rich Wehmalt—

name: Turbak
text:
To welcome the arrival of the peak flower season,
they exchange flowers with each other!
That's how this festival began.

name: Turbak
text:
The flowers given at the festival
also have a meaning.
For example—

name: Roudin
text:
Whoa, there. Let's have the
residents here introduce that
part on stream, shall we?

As Turbak continues his explanation,
Roudin interrupts him and directs the group's
gaze to the approaching figures.

name: Lilac
text:
Good work, everyone from Japan Pavilion.
I look forward to working with you today.
And...

name: Lilac
text:
It's nice to see you again, [Player]-san.
I'm happy to see you.

options.text: Lilac-san, it's been a while!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Lilac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, it's this scent...
Ah, s-sorry!
I have a habit of remembering people by their scent, so I just...

options.text: It's so lively!
Lilac-san, you smell nice...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Lilac
dialogue_after_selection.text: Ah, I was just sorting the flowers to be displayed at the festival, so the scent must have rubbed off on me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Lilac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
We're having them transported from Wehmalt for this event.
Please, take a closer sniff.

name: Lilac
text:
Roudin-san, it's nice to see you again.
...Although, we just met at Tesfinito
the other day.

name: Roudin
text:
Oh, it's been a while since the maintenance the other day.
The flowers from Wehmalt are popular
in my town, so I'm counting on you?

The group exchanges greetings with Lilac,
and then voices call out from
other approaching figures.

name: Goro (Ghostwoods)
text:
Hey, this place is bumpin'.
How's it goin', are ya enjoyin' the festival?

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
Good work, everyone.
As a resident of this city, I'm very glad
that the event has been so successful.

options.text: It's been a while, Flamier-sensei!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Good day, [Player]-sama.
Fufu, if I recall, we met by chance in Wehmalt, didn't we?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
dialogue_after_selection.text: I'm so glad that we can enjoy the flower festival together again like this, even if it's in a different form.

options.text: Goro-san, you're not drinking, are you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Goro (Ghostwoods)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...*hic*!
Don't remind me, I'm holdin' back here!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Goro (Ghostwoods)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But, well, hehe.
It's all clear after the exhibition match.
You'll join me then, right?

options.text: You two are also in your suits from that time!

text:
The two of them, Flamier and Goro,
showed up after Lilac.
The gathered group continues to exchange greetings.

name: Barrel
text:
Nice to meet you all again~!
By the way, speaking of Flamier-san
being from here, I just remembered—

name: Barrel
text:
Why is this event being held
at the Archimedes Colony~?

name: Barrel
text:
Ah, I was just a little curious, so
if it's non-public information,
it's fine...

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
It's not non-public information,
so I don't mind talking about it?
It's simply a story of a happy coincidence.

At Barrel's question, Flamier
smiles, takes a breath,
and continues talking.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
Are you all aware that the lunar city complex,
including the Archimedes Colony,
is a city with many immigrants?

options.text: Many immigrants?
I think I heard that from Rakta-san before...
Um, what do you mean?

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
The star known as the moon has no conventional residents.
Therefore, all of the residents are
pioneers and their descendants.

name: Turbak
text:
And the development of the moon's surface is still ongoing.
Even now, the population continues to grow
due to the influx from other stars.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
That's correct.
Thank you for your interest
in the moon.

name: Barrel
text:
Um, I think I learned about that
in a high school class...
But what does that have to do with this event~?

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
That is the theme of this event—
The Galaxy Carnival Expo,
and the festival.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
Everyone on this moon has
roots on various stars.
Those people think of their hometowns and—

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
Recreate their hometown's 'festival' from there.
On the moon, this has been a custom
since the early days of development.

name: Turbak
text:
They rent out parks and halls
in the colony to do it, right!?
It's become a hidden gem of the tours!

Flamier nods at Turbak's words.
But her face gradually clouds over,
and she continues in a subdued voice.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
Yes, I look forward to it every year.
...However, in recent years, there have been too
many festivals, making it difficult to secure a location.

name: Lilac
text:
I see... Certainly, to hold a festival
like this flower festival, you'd have to rent it out
for a considerable period, including preparations.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
It is just as you have wisely observed.
The lunar tourism industry wants to continue the festivals,
but there's a limit to securing locations, and then—

name: Roudin
text:
My agency set its sights on it.
If you're doing it piecemeal and don't have enough space,
just put it all together and make it an event.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
Yes. S&S Heroes is in charge of planning and management.
The Archimedes Colony provides the venue...
The former site of the ceremony.

name: Turbak
text:
Invite the guests who came to the
Summer Festa on Earth to the moon,
have them experience the festivals, and—

name: Roudin
text:
While solving the moon's problem,
we'll guide them on a massive tour package
to the participating planets.

options.text: I see...
It's a win-win situation, isn't it!?
Is S&S Heroes really a hero agency?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahaha... I get that a lot.
It's certainly more like a company than a hero agency.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, that's just our style.
It's quite different from Parallel Flight Inc., which is interesting.

name: Barrel
text:
Hoh, so that's what it was~.
Certainly, during the public license exam,
they changed the environment for each section, and—

name: Barrel
text:
They can adjust the time and
environment for each festival venue~!
Thanks, I get it now~!

name: Goro (Ghostwoods)
text:
Well, aside from the complicated stuff,
we're able to have a flashy festival like this!

name: Lilac
text:
Thanks to that, I was
able to meet all of you.
—Oops, is it about time?

options.text: Um, I have a proposal before the stream...
Why don't you two also stream in your suits from yesterday?
It might be more exciting that way!

name: Barrel
text:
Ehh, is that okay~!?
I'm getting super excited~!
I'd love to, please~!!

name: Roudin
text:
Yesterday and today, they've prepared
their costumes perfectly, so if we can match,
it'll be a great stream.

name: Turbak
text:
It's a great help, but...
are you sure you're alright?
The burden, and all...

Nodding at Turbak's words, [Player]
transforms the two of them.

And so, the group, now ready,
turns to the stream drone with smiles
and starts the stream.

name: Lilac
text:
Uh... To all our viewers.
Welcome to the Galaxy Carnival Expo,
the biggest festival on the moon.

name: Lilac
text:
Today, we'll be experiencing the
Wehmalt Flower Festival with everyone
from Japan Pavilion.

name: Goro (Ghostwoods)
text:
First, take a look at this pavilion!
It's called a flower festival, so no matter
where ya look, it's flowers, flowers, flowers!

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
To reproduce the local atmosphere,
all the flowers were transported
all the way from Wehmalt?

name: Lilac
text:
Y-Yes, that's right!
I'd like you to actually touch the flowers
and enjoy them. For example...

And so, the Wehmalt stream began.
Perhaps because he's still nervous from the start,
Lilac's expression is stiff and tense.

And as he holds up a cut flower to
explain to the camera with a nervous expression,
it suddenly moves from his hand to another.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Oh, this is quite a sight!
Well then, I'll take a little time
with the star of this festival.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
A co-starring of colorful flowers.
Watch closely, okay?
Abracadabra... Hup!

The flower moves from Lilac, is wrapped in a cloth
Roudin took from his pocket, and disappears
the moment he opens it.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Ehh!?
The flower disappeared~!
Hey, how'd you do that...

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Oh, that's a great reaction.
Well then, let's have the star reappear?
With their friends, of course!

Roudin opens the cloth again with a smile.
From it, in addition to the previous flower,
colorful flowers appear one after another.

name: Goro (Ghostwoods)
text:
Ooh, what a brilliant trick!
This'll make a great snack
with some drinks.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
Goro-sama, that's for after the exhibition.
But, it's truly some wonderful magic...

Roudin returns a smile at their reactions and
wraps the colorful flowers in the cloth. It becomes
a bouquet and is offered to Lilac.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Well, you can see all the beautiful flowers you want!
We also have a flower specialist
on site to tell you all about them?

name: Lilac
text:
Roudin-san... Thank you very much.
Um, I'm sorry for being so awkward,
I'll do my best to make it enjoyable!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Hehe, I'm sure the people
watching this can tell, right?

As the two of them laugh,
gentle smiles spread across the group.
Continuing on himself, Turbak speaks out.

name: Turbak
text:
The main attraction of the flower festival,
the flowers of Wehmalt, are not just for
looking at, but can be enjoyed in various ways!

name: Goro (Ghostwoods)
text:
You've studied well, young man!
The flowers here are used in food and drinks.
Did ya know, that they have a unique taste and are delicious?

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
You can eat this flower~!?
T-Then, are there super spicy flowers too...?

At Barrel's words, Lilac stops Goro,
who is about to chug the sake lined
up on the table, and smiles.

name: Lilac
text:
Yes, there are.
Um, it's extremely spicy,
so we only use a tiny bit, but...

Lilac, from the food table,
hands Barrel a bottled crimson flower.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Aahhah! This is a new sensation~!
The flower is spicy, of course, but the stimulation
from the nectar inside is also amazing~!!

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
I'm glad you're enjoying it.
At this festival, it's all about looking at the flowers,
taste them, and exchange them with your feelings, yes?

name: Lilac
text:
As Flamier-san said,
the flower festival is a festival to enjoy
flowers in various ways. But—

name: Lilac
text:
To give flowers with your feelings.
This custom alone has remained unchanged
for a long time, and is still rooted in Wehmalt.

name: Turbak
text:
...I see, so this city also has
something important that has never changed.
Yeah, I think that's a very happy thing!

name: Turbak
text:
...Oops!
It's almost time for the exhibition match!
To all our viewers, please look forward to that too!

After ending the stream with everyone's smiles,
the group starts moving to the special stage,
just like yesterday.

Chapter 3:
Flower Carnival

options.text: Whoa, there are more spectators than yesterday!
The advertising is working!
Let's do our best today too!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Whoa!!
There are more customers than yesterday~!
Let's get this place super excited~!!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
It seems the stream from yesterday and the
festival's advertising are really paying off.
This is great.

name: Turbak
text:
We have to get everyone excited today too,
and make sure they have fun!
[Player]-kun, can I ask you to transform me?

[Player] approves the transformation,
and heads to the stage with Turbak and the others.
There, a familiar voice calls out.

name: Lilac
text:
Um, [Player]-san!
Can you transform me into the
same suit I wore in Tesfinito?

name: Lilac
text:
I... I want you and Roudin-san to see.
That I've grown properly.

name: Lilac
text:
I'm still awkward, like in the stream earlier...
But still, I want to show you that I'm moving forward!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
That smile is more than enough!
But, if you're okay with it, I'd be more
than happy to have you make the stage shine.

note:
it's insane how much they teased this event in the hero interviews
first it was Roudin's lemonade stand, then Barrel with his family problems,
and now Lilac with his promise to 'wear the suit once again'

options.text: I'd be more than happy to!
At this point, one more person wouldn't change anything.
Lilac-san's swimsuit!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin (Stella Link)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're saying the quiet part out loud...?
That kind of thing is better kept to yourself...?

name: Lilac (Summer Nights)
text:
Thank you very much!
I'll do my best,
so please watch me!

Lilac heads to the stage,
and [Player] calls out to Flamier and Goro,
who are seeing him off.

options.text: You two can join in as well!
At this point, let's all have fun together!
I want to see you in your suits from last time!

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
Are you sure?
The stage will be more exciting,
so I'd love to, but...

name: Goro (Ghostwoods)
text:
This is on the premise that it's not a burden for ya.
If it's too much, just say so, okay?

At the surprised voices of the two,
[Player] nods and
approves their transformation.

name: Turbak
text:
Now we're all set.
Let's go, everyone!
To deliver the best happiness!
Battle Start

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
To all our viewers~!!
The festival man of Japan Pavilion!
Symphonic Trigger~!!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
From here on, it's Japan Pavilion's introduction~!
Everyone from Wehmalt Pavilion,
please treat us well~!!

After the stage, which was even more
lively than yesterday, the group
moved to Japan Pavilion.

And, with the excitement still lingering,
the group starts the second half of the stream.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Ahhh, the exhibition match
was super exciting~!!
It felt awesome~!!

name: Lilac
text:
Yes, it was a really fun stage.
To think I'd be able to stand on stage in that suit again.
Haha, what a good memory that was!

The group nods with a smile
at Barrel and Lilac's words.
Looking at their faces, Barrel continues the stream.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
And look at this~!
The festival stalls have even more
guests than yesterday~!!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Hehe, this is great.
We might need to add more
seats to the pavilion.

name: Turbak
text:
There's still a little empty space,
so I'll talk to the staff about
adding more stalls!

name: Goro (Ghostwoods)
text:
Oh, that's a good idea!
We don't have much time, so if ya ask me,
I can whip 'em up in no time?

name: Goro (Ghostwoods)
text:
Just right, how about a stall with
Japanese sake and food that goes with it?
Hehe, like Japanese sake and oden?

name: Turbak
text:
Ah, I've heard of that culture too!
Leave it to me, I'll make
your wish come true, Goro-san!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Hey, hey, it's fine to accept,
but if it gets tough, let me know, alright?
As long as it's within your limits, yeah?

After confirming that Turbak nodded
at his words, Roudin smiles.
There, another voice echoes.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text: Roudin-sama!!

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
Your Parallel Weapon...
It was truly, truly wonderful!!

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
Ah... The sparkle of the flower
field that filled the stage...
It's still burned into my eyes!!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
O-Oh!?
Ah... Thanks, Flamier.
I don't really know why it's fireworks, though.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Huh, really~?
Isn't there some kind of episode
related to fireworks or something~?

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
In Tesfinito, fireworks are going off
somewhere every day.
So they're pretty familiar to me, but...

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Well, it's not inconvenient for now,
so I'll let you know if I remember anything.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
Roudin-sama, your passionate feelings for flowers...
When that time comes, please allow
me to be present as well. And...

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
When that time comes, please!!
Won't you share the stage with
me in my usual suit!?

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
Ah... If I add the scent of gunpowder and the heat
that stings the skin to the beautiful flower field,
what a wonderful marriage it would be...

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Ah... I get it.
If our schedules match,
I don't exactly mind?

name: Goro (Ghostwoods)
text:
Let's save the complicated stuff for later!
Today's schedule is the last, right?
Then, there's only one thing to do!

As he says that, the festival food that Goro
and the others brought to the nearby table,
and the sake, are lined up one after another.

The scene of the heroes enjoying the festival stalls
is broadcast to the viewers, and the stream ends
with great success.

And, the festival stall table
transforms into a banquet
hall as it is.

name: Turbak
text:
[Player]-kun, good work!
So, are you enjoying the festival?
Is there anything troubling you?

options.text: I'm having a lot of fun!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I see, that's great!
If there's anything else you'd like, please let me know, and I'll see what I can do!

options.text: I might have eaten a little too much...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
A-Are you okay!?
Please sit there until you feel better.
I'll bring you some stomach medicine later.

options.text: I'm having fun, but not too much to affect tomorrow.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-kun, you're amazing!
I've completely forgotten about tomorrow and am just enjoying myself to the fullest!

text:
As Turbak says, he quietly sits down
in the seat next to [Player].

name: Turbak
text:
You know, I'm having a lot of fun!
That a lot of people have gathered for the festival,
and that we can share a lot of happiness.

name: Turbak
text:
...A festival always ends at some point, right?
But if the memories remain,
it will continue to live on in people's hearts.

name: Turbak
text:
And so, I want to share a lot
of happiness and leave it behind,
that's my own dream!

options.text: That's a very wonderful dream.
...Is there a reason for that?
I wouldn't force you to talk, but...

name: Turbak
text:
Thank you, [Player]-kun.
...You know, I was born on a remote star, in a family of
ritualists who presided over the festivals of that star.

name: Turbak
text:
From a time so long ago that even I don't know.
We've been ritualists for generations,
so I thought I'd become one too when I grew up.

As he says, remembering his own past,
Turbak's face clouds over for a moment,
and then he quickly smiles as usual.

name: Turbak
text:
...But, a rare mineral was found in my hometown.
By the time I became an adult, my hometown had developed,
and most of the residents were from outside.

name: Turbak
text:
...Before I could even inherit the position,
the festivities were gone. So, I left my
hometown and became a tour conductor.

name: Turbak
text:
To travel to various stars, share memories
with the people of those stars.
And to connect them.

name: Turbak
text:
Because, people's memories and my own memories.
If a lot of people remember them, I can afford
feel like my hometown's festival is still alive, right?

options.text: I think I understand, a little.
Is that so...
Ah, so that's why your Parallel Weapon is a thread.

name: Turbak
text:
Maybe that's why my Parallel
Weapon became a thread.
To share, and connect.

name: Turbak
text:
By the way, that suit is the outfit of
the ritualist I was supposed to become!
I was so happy when I first transformed!

name: Turbak
text:
Oops, sorry for talking so long!
Since we'll be working together from now on,
I wanted you to know about me!

Smiling shyly, Turbak takes out
his device to tell them the
next day's schedule.

name: Turbak
text:
There are no exchange stream scheduled for tomorrow.
The coordination with the planned
pavilions didn't go very well.

name: Turbak
text:
So, tomorrow I'm thinking of going to
inspect the pavilions that are lively.
Of course, you are welcome to join me or not!

name: Turbak
text:
That festival is supposed to be really innovative,
so I'm really looking forward to it.
I'd be happy if you could join me!

At his words,
Turbak smiles at [Player].

Taking [Player]'s hand, he returns to the others.
The clamor of the festival stalls continued
until the very last minute.

name: Boy's Voice
text:
Wow!
There are so many bonfires!
It's beautiful, Dad!!

name: Father's Voice
text:
Yes, today is a day to be grateful for
the connection between us humans and this land,
and to carve it into our memories.

name: Father's Voice
text:
It's not just a festival for you.
Watch carefully the ceremony
I'm about to perform.

name: Father's Voice
text:
What I inherited from my father, and what
my father inherited from his father.
From a time so long ago, it's been passed down and preserved.

name: Father's Voice
text:
Someday, you will inherit it.
And you, in turn, will pass it down
to someone else. Understood?

name: Boy's Voice
text:
I'll inherit it from you, Dad,
and I'll pass it down to someone else...
Hmm, I don't really get it, but okay!

name: Father's Voice
text:
Haha, that's fine for now.
The day will come when you understand.
You're a good boy, Turbak.

name: Father's Voice
text:
Now, it's time for the ceremony.
When it's over, let's enjoy the festival together.

name: Turbak
text:
Yay! I want the skewered meat from the stall...
No, I have to study the ceremony first!
I'm going to be just like you, Dad!

That day, I still remember
it vividly.

The flames of the bonfires floating in the darkness,
the voices of people echoing in the distance, and—

The precious warmth transmitted
from that slightly bony hand.

yes, the wording is exactly the same as Barrel's part of the story
poetic, isn't it?

Gwahahaha!
It's proceeding quite smoothly!!

If we can welcome the full opening tomorrow like this,
it's only a matter of time before I
take control of the event!

Take control of the event, you saY?
That goal setting is not something we've shareD.
But, it's very interestiNG! I too, should do somethiNG...

Ah...
This guy is just talking for the sake of it,
so you don't have to mind him.

But, it's true, if we're going to do this,
we have to go all out and take
the event for ourselves! That's the spirit!

Kukuku, you understand, don't you.
Well then, shall we go,
it's time to unveil our 'festival'!!
